channel.title: xcode on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in xcode on Barefoot Rob

item.title: XCode do you hate me
item.description: 19:27 Friday 11 August 2017 JST Oh XCode, you’re so quirky. You automatically change Images.xcassets, automatically add the changes to git, AND automatically restore the changes after I revert them. This might be helpful if you did not also refuse to build the app due to missing images. I hate building iOS apps. Utterly shit experience all the fucking time. Why do sandboxed users have to have difficult passwords? I don’t mind good passwords for real users, but not for sandboxed users.

item.title: Working on XCode 8
item.description: 13:37 Monday 12 September 2016 JST Downloaded XCode 8 and had 6000+ warnings of duplicate identifiers. Had to set NO_… to NO to fix them.

item.title: Reason 8,149 to hate apple
Bah Xcode
item.description: 23:40 Tuesday 13 October 2015 JST Bah. It seems I cannot submit an osTV app to TestFlight without having an Apple TV device connected to my computer. I hope that’s a bug, not an attempt to sell more devices. Bah.

item.title: xcode worst nightmare
item.description: ##21:01 Sunday 23 November 2014 JST## Why why why oh why oh why why oh why Why do all the iOS 7.1 simulators get destroyed when I install Xcode 6? Why is there not a way to delete all the ones that don’t work in one shot? Why does the UI require like 4 clicks all over the place to create even a single simulator? Why does the simulator creation allow me to create unlimited identical simulators?
